quoteText: If at any time you’d like me to help you find a therapist, you can type the word " Therapist" in the chat and I’ll help you locate someone in your area.
author: Bea

quoteText: Life is full of ups and downs, but the fact that you’re showing up to work toward your goal means that you’re on the right path.
author: Bea

quoteText: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quoteText: In any given moment we have two options: to step forward into growth or step back into safety
author: B.F. Skinner

quoteText: When you climb a mountain, you do it step by step; what is important is the step you are taking now.
author: Sayadaw U Tejaniya

quoteText: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quoteText: If you have a moment, close your eyes and take a few deep breaths before moving on with your day.
author: Bea

quoteText: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quoteText: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
author: H. G. Wells

quoteText: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot
